reviews.review_msg: If you learn best by the usual: textbook, power point type lecture DO NOT take this prof. No textbook, but you MUST pay close attention in lectures because the material is heavy.. he is brilliant in his field obviously, but the stuff is challenging.. he will NOT coddle you, you must demand help and he will happily give it to you!

I take back the nice comment and smiley face I gave earlier.  I walked into the final with an A, totally confident in my preparation.  Walked out totally sure I had nailed it.  Got 55%! :(  DO NOT TAKE THIS COURSE!!!

Bruce is a great prof! However much you put into this class is what you will get out.  Yes, the tests are a challenge, but think of them as a T/F test, not MC.  It is a 4-credit course (with only 3 hrs of class/wk!), so you need to work at it: review lectures online each week and you'll be golden! The TA is amazing, go to office hours every week!

the WORST proff i have ever had in my whole university life so far!Exams are impossible, and have nothing to do with what he talks about in class, and that being said you can not understand anything he says or writes anyways. No text book used, so attending his boring lectures are pretty much a must. If i have any advice, and i wish this was given
Really unclear teaching, and no use of texts.  Exams are nearly impossible to pass.

Pay attention in class, and read the notes provided. Whittlesea may not always be as clear as he could be in lecture (do to time restrictions), but if you ask a question after class or in his (or TA's) tutorials, whatever you had trouble with will be cleared up.
PASSIONATE ABOUT MATERIAL WHCIH MAKES IT FUN, MPL. CHX PART OF EXAM NEARLY IMPOSSIBLE!

Really nice. 90% content straight form from the text thats short and easy to read. Multichoice easy. Final cumulative but seriously like 2 questions from first half so w.e. easy. Written harder but still fine if you study hard but we complained and he made them way easier for the final.
No one failed the class smartie pants, you clearly didn't listen to him discuss the grade scaling. Dr prime is wonderful! Best prof ever, easy course, fun material :)
